div.head: 留氣結胸
div.div: bound chest because of abiding qi

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: bound chest because of abiding qi

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xiong bi 胸痹 , chest blockage. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry ren shen 人參： 張仲景治胸痹，心中痞堅，留氣結胸 , “Zhang Zhongjing [applies it] to cure chest blockage, obstacle-illness and hardening in the heart, and bound chest be cause of abiding qi ”.
